attributes.action: All NHS staff employed from April 2022 to March 2023 get pro rata bonus payments
attributes.additional_details: To ensure fairness and that hard work of all NHS staff recognised
attributes.background:
I have 37 years of service with NHS but because I retired on 28th February 2023 and returned to NHS employment on 2nd April 2023 I will receive none of the bonus payments as agreed with pay deal.
I would like parliament to ensure all staff who were working for NHS last financial year will get this

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/638717
